title.narrative: Bridging Together Youth, Diaspora and Local Authorities for an Integrated Approach to Promote Employment and Address Irregular Migration in the Gambia, Guinea Conakry and Guinea Bissau

description.narrative: This project aims to promote safe migration and create alternatives to irregular migration and to contribute to respond to gaps and challenges identified in youth employment and implementation of migration and development policies by fostering youth agency and employment in communities of origin in 3 countries. Regarding Gambia, IOM will conduct activities to better target migration and capacity building activities, further reinforce the diaspora engagement for the country development, support local authorities to implement actions contributing to youth employment by rolling out awareness raising campaigns on safe migration and on alternatives to irregular migration. Regarding Guinea-Bissau, 200 youths will develop their skills and micro-enterprises in line with local market, community’s needs, and environmental sensitive options. The project intends to develop 5 community-based projects that will also attract Guinean students from abroad to train youth. Regarding Guinea, IOM will support the government to boost diaspora engagement and will intend to support local authorities in concluding at least two partnerships with enterprises and local actors to provide 200 youth with skills and create small business outsourcing. Also, IOM will support to the Master Programme for local development that Diaspora professionals of IULM University of Milan have submitted to two public universities in Guinea.

participating-org.narrative: Italy - AICS - Agenzia Italiana per la Cooperazione allo Sviluppo / Italian Agency for Cooperation and Development

mailing-address.narrative: Donka Bloc de Professeurs Rue DI- 252, Conakry, Guinea

sector.narrative: Facilitation of orderly, safe, regular and responsible migration and mobility

policy-marker.narrative: Project with no inclusion of gender issues

provider-org.narrative: Italy - AICS - Agenzia Italiana per la Cooperazione allo Sviluppo / Italian Agency for Cooperation and Development
